lore: Rumors of Taylor's cruel eccentricities spread throughout the neighboring territories after the construction of the Torture Chamber. When they reached his mother's ears, she went into a deep depression and ended up taking her own life. Heartbroken and tortured by guilt, Taylor's father set out on a journey to solve the problem.\n\nDoomguards possess endurance and vitality that few creatures can match. Some, like the Pit Guard, can share this energy with their allies to protect them.
menagerieDialog: Huff...\n\n(Why does it look so tired?)
(It's continuously slamming its shield into the ground. How obnoxious.)
(Its breathing is slow and hoarse, and it doesn't seem to be looking at anything in particular. Creepy.)
(It's attempting to sweep the floor with its shield. Thanks!)
(It's scraping a gauntleted finger over its shield to make a horrible screeching noise.)
name: Pit Guard
